question:
You recently went a concert and thought one of the singers was very good. You want to tell him how you feel.


Write a letter to the singer. In your letter,


Say how you felt about his performance
give details of your musical activities
explain how you would like him to help you with your musical activities
text: I would like to convey how I felt while attending your performance at the music festival. It will be always one of the cherished moments in my life.

In addition to ,that I am one of the upcoming singers in my town. So, I would need some clarifications which would aid me to perform at my best in future. I am your ardent fan, I came to your concert last week with my friends. While you were singing lines from your first album, I could see tears rolling down my cheeks after hearing them.

Mainly, Your godly tone accompanied with melancholic music of piano and guitar was surreal. In my hometown, I am singing in a local band and practising a new method to reach a high pitch during my performances is not yielding better results. If you could share your opinions on how to lose the stage fear and sustain for a longer period of time before the crowd.
